articles.title: Chongbong Band Gives Performance on New Year's Day
articles.content:
Chongbong Band Gives Performance on New Year's Day
 Pyongyang, January 3 (KCNA) -- A performance of the Chongbong Band of the Wangjaesan Art Troupe was given at the People's Palace of Culture Friday on the New Year, Juche 105 (2016).
					 Among the audience were working people, including the workers of the 
					
					Kim Jong Suk Pyongyang Textile Mill and the Pyongyang Children's Foodstuff Factory, youth and students in the city and foreign guests staying in the DPRK.
					
					 The performance began with preludes "Sound of a Bell" and "Snow Is Falling on New Year's Day."
					
					 Put on the stage were female chorus "Ode to the Motherland" and other colorful numbers.
					
					 The performers sang high praises of the immortal dedication of Marshal Kim Jong Un and his love for the people and undying feats. 
					
					 Light music "Song of Big Fish Haul", light music and song "Sea of Apples at Foot of Chol Pass" and other numbers were acclaimed by the audience for their unique representation of the country advancing with dynamism.
					
					 The rich voices of female singers matched well with the peculiar echoes of Korean-style light music, greatly exciting the audience for its liveliness and freshness.
					
					 The performance little short of an advance song of the New Year ended with epilogue "Snow Is Falling on New Year's Day".
					
					 The performance continues.

articles.title: Anniversary of Kim Jong Il's Work Marked
articles.content:
Anniversary of Kim Jong Il's Work Marked
 Pyongyang, January 3 (KCNA) -- Rodong Sinmun Sunday dedicates an article to the 24th anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il's work "The Historical Lesson in Building Socialism and the General Line of Our Party".
					 The work, published on Jan. 3, Juche 81 (1992), expounds the iron will of Kim Jong Il to hold fast to the general line of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK) and accomplish the socialist cause of Juche.
					
					 To carry through the general line which indicates the general orientation and fundamental way for building socialism is a key problem related to the destiny of the socialist cause, the article says, and goes on:
					
					 The past more than two decades are the proud annals during which the validity and tremendous vitality of the WPK's general line based on the Juche idea have been fully demonstrated.
					
					 By taking advantage of frustration of socialism in different countries, the imperialists and reactionaries made desperate efforts to isolate and stifle the DPRK while talking about the "end" of socialism and "victory" of capitalism.
					
					 In the vortex of history, the WPK took the untrodden path, holding high the general line on building socialism as the ever-victorious banner.  
					
					 Under the leadership of the party, the people's power has been further cemented as a representative of the independent right of the popular masses, organizer of creative ability and activities, householder responsible for the people's life and protector of their interests, and the driving force of the Korean revolution has remarkably grown stronger.
					
					 The DPRK could demonstrate its might as a political, ideological and military power and youth power before the world, dash forward towards the building of a power of knowledge-based economy and highly civilized nation, and all the service personnel and people could prepare themselves to be independent lifeguards, keeping socialism as their life. This is the precious results of the general line on building socialism.

articles.title: S. Korean Authorities' Pro-Japanese Servile Act Assailed
articles.content:
S. Korean Authorities' Pro-Japanese Servile Act Assailed 
 Pyongyang, January 3 (KCNA) -- The south Korean authorities' allaying the issue of sexual slavery for the Imperial Japanese Army through an "agreement" with Japan is the disgraceful act of treachery by which they unhesitatingly sold out the dignity and interests of the nation to the sworn enemy of the Korean nation, Rodong Sinmun Sunday says in a commentary. 
					 The south Korean authorities' servile act is an insult to the victims of the sexual slavery for the Imperial Japanese Army and their families who bear bitter grudge towards the Japanese imperialists and an act of treachery of dampening the wishes of the south Korean people to clearly settle with Japan over the past crimes and regain the national dignity, the commentary says, and goes on:
					
					 The humiliating talks over the issue of the sexual slavery held in south Korea and an "agreement" enraging all the Koreans are somewhat attributable to the U.S. interference. 
					
					 The Korean nation will condemn the five traitors of Ulsa (1905) who sold out the country to the Japanese imperialists down through generations. 
					
					 The present south Korean conservative ruling quarters are thrice-cursed traitors surpassing the five traitors of Ulsa. 
					
					 They surely deserve divine punishment as they do not hesitate to commit traitorous acts to hurt the fellow countrymen in the north. 
					
					 The Korean nation will never pardon the traitors selling out the dignity and interests of the nation while staking their fate on pro-U.S. and pro-Japanese acts but will severely punish them.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Denounces S. Korean Military Authorities for Their War Hysteria against North
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Denounces S. Korean Military Authorities for Their War Hysteria against North
 Pyongyang, January 3 (KCNA) -- The Defense Affairs Agency and the Aero-space Industrial Company of south Korea Friday set up a "work team" grouping tens of members for the development of new-generation fighters which introduced the U.S. core technology.
					 The south Korean military bellicose forces are mulling spending a huge amount of funds for purchasing lots of latest war hardware necessary for a war against the north this year, too.
					
					 Minju Joson Sunday observes in a commentary in this regard:
					
					 Such moves are little different from a prelude foretelling the situation of the Korean Peninsula that can be graver this year than last year.
					
					The moves to purchase war hardware and bellicose outbursts made by the south Korean military elements around the New Year's day clearly proves once again that the south Korean authorities are paying lip-service to "peaceful unification" and "improved relations" but they are engrossed in their ambition to ignite a war against the north. This also proves that the south Korean war-thirsty forces are the chief criminal escalating tensions on the Korean Peninsula and bringing the dark clouds of war.
					
					 It is the steadfast stand of the DPRK to make persevering efforts to achieve peace on the peninsula and stability in the region.
					
					 However, if the aggressors provoke the DPRK even a bit, it will never pardon them but resolutely counter them with its merciless, just and sacred war, great war for national reunification.
					
					 In case, the south Korean warmongers launch a war on this land, oblivious of the above-said warning, the revolutionary armed forces of the DPRK will deal a merciless punishment to them so that they may fully understand what a dear price they would pay for.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un's Work Published in Algeria
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un's Work Published in Algeria
 Pyongyang, January 3 (KCNA) -- Marshal Kim Jong Un's work "Let Us Add Eternal Brilliance to Comrade Kim Jong Il's Great Idea and Achievements of the Songun Revolution" was brought out in pamphlet by an Algerian publishing house.
					 The work, published on Aug. 25, Juche 102 (2013), deals with Songun revolutionary leadership exploits of leader Kim Jong Il and essence and originality of Songun revolutionary idea and indicates the tasks for successfully accomplishing the revolutionary cause of Songun.
					
					 A book-releasing ceremony took place at the publishing house on Dec. 27 last year.

articles.title: Great Men of Mt. Paektu to Be Lauded in Spain
articles.content:
Great Men of Mt. Paektu to Be Lauded in Spain
 Pyongyang, January 3 (KCNA) -- A Spanish preparatory committee for the meeting of praising the great men of Mt. Paektu in 2017 was formed in Tarragona on Dec. 24 last year.
					 Alejandro Cao de Benos, chairman of the Korean Friendship Association headquartered in Spain, was elected chairman of the preparatory committee.
					
					 The committee decided to organize political and cultural events to praise the exploits of President Kim Il Sung, leader Kim Jong Il and Marshal Kim Jong Un.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il's Life and Exploits Praised by Foreign Organizations
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il's Life and Exploits Praised by Foreign Organizations
 Pyongyang, January 3 (KCNA) -- Organizations of different countries posted special write-ups on their websites on Dec. 16 and 17 last year on the fourth anniversary of demise of leader Kim Jong Il.
					 The Anti-Imperialist Forum of Germany posted on its website an articles titled "Fourth anniversary of demise of Chairman of the National Defence Commission Kim Jong Il", "Eternal general secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea", "Dedication to country and its people" and "Last year of great life" illustrated with a portrait of smiling Kim Jong Il and his pictures.
					
					 The articles said that the Korean people are holding Kim Jong Il as eternal general secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea and chairman of the National Defence Commission of the DPRK and adding shine to his exploits.
					
					 They praised him for always founding himself among the people and making ceaseless journeys for field guidance for them all his life.
					
					 The Polish branch of the Korean Friendship Association in an article accompanied with his photo praised him for making contributions to building socialism in the DPRK, strengthening the Korean People's Army and achieving the cause of national reunification.
					
					 The National Committee for the Study of the Juche Idea of DR Congo posted an article titled "Whole life dedicated to prosperity of country and people's happiness" on its website.

articles.title: Korean People's Cause of National Reunification Supported by Foreign Media
articles.content:
Korean People's Cause of National Reunification Supported by Foreign Media
 Pyongyang, January 3 (KCNA) -- Uruguayan and Brazilian media carried articles supporting the Korean people's cause of national reunification.
					 The Uruguayan paper La Juventud on Dec. 19 last year carried an article illustrated with a portrait of smiling President Kim Il Sung.
					
					 The article said that Kim Il Sung, eternal leader of the Korean people, advanced the proposal for founding the Democratic Federal Republic of Koryo at the historic Sixth Congress of the Workers' Party of Korea in October, 1980 to indicate the most correct orientation and way for the country's reunification. The article went on:
					
					 Leader Kim Jong Il ushered in the June 15 era of reunification out of his noble patriotism, opening up a bright prospect for national reunification.
					
					 This was unanimously supported and welcomed by all the Koreans as well as the international community as the joint declaration was the only agreement reached between the north and south over the mode of reunification in the long history of national division.
					
					 The article urged the international community to support the proposal for reunification by federal formula, being aware that anachronistic ambition for "unification through absorption" sought by the south Korean authorities would only bring a war.
					
					 On the same day, the Brazilian Committee for Solidarity with the DPRK posted on its website an article urging the south Korean authorities not to bring the issue of national reunification, internal issue of the nation, here and there but make clear their attitude towards the mode of reunification reached between the north and south.

articles.title: Demolition of Concrete Wall and Conclusion of Peace Treaty Demanded
articles.content:
Demolition of Concrete Wall and Conclusion of Peace Treaty Demanded
 Pyongyang, January 3 (KCNA) -- Helmi El Hadidi, chairperson of the Afro-Asian People's Solidarity Organization, made public a statement on December 25 last year in demand of the demolition of the concrete wall built in the area south of the Korean Peninsula and the conclusion of a peace treaty between the DPRK and the U.S. 
					 Seven decades have passed since Korea was divided by the U.S. and 36 years have passed since the south Korean authorities built the concrete wall to divide the Korean Peninsula, the statement said, and went on:
					
					 The concrete wall is the symbol of the national division and a big physical obstacle in the way of improving the inter-Korean relations, ensuring peace and achieving the reunification of Korea. 
					
					 Once the concrete wall is removed and the Armistice Agreement is replaced by a peace treaty, the demilitarized zone will turn into a peace zone and a bright prospect will be opened for inter-Korean dialogue, exchange and economic cooperation, which are of important significance for hastening reunification and prosperity of Korea. 
					
					 This will be a great contribution to boosting economic cooperation in Northeast Asia and achieving world peace and security. 
					
					 The Afro-Asian People's Solidarity Organization strongly demands the south Korean authorities pull down the concrete wall at an early date and the U.S. respond to the proposal of the DPRK for replacing the Armistice Agreement by a peace treaty for peace, security and economic development in Northeast Asia.

articles.title: U.S. Forces' Tests on Anthrax Germ Denounced
articles.content:
U.S. Forces' Tests on Anthrax Germ Denounced
 Pyongyang, January 3 (KCNA) -- The Switzerland-Korea Committee and the Swiss Group for the Study of the Juche Idea made public a joint statement on December 27 last year in denunciation of the anthrax germ tests by the U.S. imperialist aggressor forces in south Korea. 
					 The statement said the U.S. introduced anthrax and pest germs into the military bases in south Korea and conducted tests on germ weapons several times at the tacit connivance of the south Korean authorities. This proved that it was a sheer lie that the U.S. asserted it was the first time that it conducted anthrax germ test, the statement said, and went on:
					
					 The U.S. tests on germ weapons were aimed at making preparations for a bio-chemical war against the DPRK and killing the Korean people. 
					
					 Now the U.S. has turned south Korea into the biggest nuclear arsenal in the world and the place for tests on bio-chemical weapons. 
					
					 This is the heinous crime against mankind and part of the preparations for massacres. 
					
					 The south Korean authorities are the group of most vicious traitors as they connive at the U.S. criminal acts and support them. 
					
					 We bitterly denounce the U.S. introduction of anthrax and pest germs into south Korea as the heinous crime against the Korean people.
